mapper.select: SELECT id, name, status FROM role WHERE 1 = 1 AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND status = #{status} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.auth_key, p.type FROM role r JOIN role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id AND r.status = 1 JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND p.status = 1 WHERE r.id = #{roleId}
